Hi! What symptoms are you facing today?
I have red, scaly bumps on my scalp that have been there for 10 years and they leave scars and cause hair loss in those areas.
Have you been diagnosed with any skin conditions in the past, or do you have any recurring skin issues?
Yes, I have these lesions on my scalp that respond to cream treatment but keep coming back when I stop using the cream.
What type of cream has been effective for your symptoms?
The cream that has been effective for my symptoms is a topical corticosteroid.
Does anyone in your family have similar symptoms or has been diagnosed with skin conditions?
I haven't mentioned anything about family history related to similar symptoms or skin conditions.
Final Diagnosis: Folliculitis Decalvans
